title: Mini-Ep 56: Flex Your Joy Muscle
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 56: Flex Your Joy Muscle
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree hear from a former ballet dancer about body positivity, discuss the deliciousness of ranch dressing, offer words of wisdom to a woman mourning the end of a toxic relationship, and consider how to help a friend who just received a cancer ...
description:
Kate and Doree hear from a former ballet dancer about body positivity, discuss the deliciousness of ranch dressing, offer words of wisdom to a woman mourning the end of a toxic relationship, and consider how to help a friend who just received a cancer diagnosis.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Talkspace - Go to talkspace.com and use promo code FOREVER35 to get $45 off your first month.
  • Robinhood - Sign up for a free stock at forever35.robinhood.com.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
